ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering and raising skill level
ygData.msgSnippet: Do a /who or /who all command on their name and see if *GM* appears before their name. If you see them in-game, they have a green name. If you re referring to
ygData.messageBody:
Do a /who or /who all command on their name and see if "*GM* appears before
their name. If you see them in-game, they have a green name.

If you're referring to me, I'm not a Game Master :) I'm the Guild Master of
Trade Council :) See our webpage at http://tradecouncil.eqrealms.com/ if you
really want to :)
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

Dennis Chan wrote:

> From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
